actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to designate the period beginning October 14, 1973, and ending October 20, 1973, as National Machine Tool Week.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to designate the period beginning October 14, 1973, and ending October 20, 1973, as "National Machine Tool Week".

titles.title: Joint resolution authorizing the President to designate the period beginning October 14, 1973, and ending October 20, 1973, as National Machine Tool Week.
